title: Bug 117981: Inability to select items at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item at the first attempt.

OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node, preventing item selection.

EB: After adding a label to the library file, it should be possible to select the label item in the library outline view without the focus jumping to the library file node.

SR: 1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Verify that the label item can be selected without the focus shifting to the library file node.
